item.title: [GLOBAL][Databases] - MongoDB migration
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 17, 11:54 UTC  -  Jul 28, 11:54 UTC

May 23, 07:12 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 17/07/2023 11:54 UTC
End time : 28/07/2023 11:54 UTC
Service impact : A small downtime may be experienced for less than 15 minutes.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our services, we will be doing a migration for our MongoDB nodes.

item.title: [Global][PublicCloud] - OpenStack - RabbitMQ upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 3, 08:00 UTC  -  Aug 9, 10:00 UTC

Jun 21, 01:06 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/07/2023 08:00 UTC
End time : 09/08/2023 10:00 UTC
Service impact : OpenStack API will be unavailable for 30min up to 2H during the operation.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for RabbitMQ (Message queue service).
The upgrade will be rolled out following this schedule :
w27 (03/07)
BHS1 03/07 08:00 UTC
SYD1 04/07 13:00 UTC
w28 (10/07)
BHS3 10/07 08:00 UTC
SGP1 11/07 13:00 UTC
DE1 12/07 19:00 UTC
w29 (17/07)
BHS5 17/07 08:00 UTC
WAW1 17/07 19:00 UTC
SBG5 18/07 19:00 UTC
GRA1 19/07 19:00 UTC
w30 (24/07)
GRA11 24/07 19:00 UTC
UK1 25/07 19:00 UTC
GRA5 26/07 19:00 UTC
SBG7 27/07 19:00 UTC
w31 (31/07)
US-WEST-OR1 31/07 08:00 UTC
GRA9 31/07 19:00 UTC
US-EAST-VA-1 01/08 08:00 UTC
w32 (07/08)
GRA7 07/08 19:00 UTC
GRA3 08/08 19:00 UTC

item.title: [GRA7][Public Cloud] - Customers migration Kubernetes to 1.22
item.description:
Jun 27, 11:53 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 26, 06:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 8, 21:54 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 26/06/2023 06:00 UTC
End time : 27/06/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version
Service improvement :As Kubernetes 1.21 comes to the end of its life, we will be migrating to the new version 1.22.

item.title: [GRA1/GRA3][PublicCloud] - OpenStack API perturbation
item.description:
Jun 27, 02:09 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 26/06/2023 11:58 UTC
End Time : 26/06/2023 22:31 UTC
Service impact : OpenStack API responses was experiencing some perturbations.
Root cause : a href="https://bare-metal-servers.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/fcwl3mwh75b9">Related incident
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 26, 22:31 UTC
Monitoring - No more perturbation on OpenStack API is observed.
Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.

Jun 26, 15:14 UTC
Identified - Update : This incident is related to this incident https://bare-metal-servers.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/fcwl3mwh75b9

A network equipement must be replaced

Jun 26, 12:20 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jun 26, 12:14 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 26/06/2023 11:58 UTC
Service impact : OpenStack API responses might experience some perturbation.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
